import React from "react"; import img from '../../../../Assets/img/pexels-polina-tankilevitch-5585863.jpg' import img2 from '../../../../Assets/img/pexels-bess-hamiti-35188.jpg' import img3 from '../../../../Assets/img/pexels-photo-8126210.jpeg' interface IProps{ } let Home : React.FC = () => { return( /*
Welcome to Brains Kart

We deliver you the ultimate shopping experience. Get ready to witness latest varieties in Men's , Women's and Kids wear and get them delivered right to your doorstep.

Let's begin your journey with us!!!

*/

SUMMER SALE

DON'T COMPROMISE ON STYLE! GET FLAT 30% OFF FOR NEW ARRIVALS.

Kids Collections

DON'T COMPROMISE ON STYLE! GET FLAT 30% OFF FOR NEW ARRIVALS.

AUTUMN COLLECTION

DON'T COMPROMISE ON STYLE! GET FLAT 30% OFF FOR NEW ARRIVALS.

 ) } export default Home;
